code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/kirill/Documents/\u0414\u043E\u043A\u0443\u043C\u0435\u043D\u0442\u044B \u2014 MacBook Pro - Customer/IT/internature/User-Management-IT-Workin-test-task-/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";export function userRedusers(action){switch(action.type){case"ADD_USER":var newUser={id:action.payload.id,name:action.payload.name,surname:action.payload.surname,e_mail:action.payload.e_mail};return newUser;}}export function usersReducers(state,action){switch(action.type){case"ADD_USER":return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[userRedusers(action)]);case"REMOVE_USER":var actionPayloadId=action.payload.id;return state.filter(function(s){return s.id!==actionPayloadId;});default:return state;}}
